name: Lightkeeper (Jack Rathbone, Michaela Bussey, Juliette Love, Diyanka Govender)
name_original: Lightkeeper (Jack Rathbone, Michaela Bussey, Juliette Love, Diyanka Govender)
description:
Made for the 2022 South Africa 'The Campus Game Jam'

Ahoy there, the name's Theodore Riddle, lightkeeper of the coast. Five years ago I fell off me bloody lighthouse and kicked the bucket. Now I spend me days using the ol' gal as a decoy to mess with the sea-fairers who wronged me! And I need YOU to help me with me tasks!

HOW TO PLAY

Use the beam of the lighthouse to push boats away and into dangerous objects to sink them. Click and drag from the lighthouse in order to move the beam of light. Click on buoys to turn their lights on or off. Lit buoys will push boats away.

CREDITS

Team: Four Old Men

Art and Animation: Michaela Bussey and Diyanka Govender

Programming and level design: Jack Rathbone

Sound and music: Juliette Love

*All assets & sound made by team except for font & camera script credited ingame
